description.raw:
While testing different build types (see #2) I came across a compiler warning in `polhemus_driver`, which becomes a hard failure due to `-Werror`.

~~~
[ 25%] Building C object CMakeFiles/polhemus_driver.dir/src/polhemus_driver.c.o
/home/scpeters/ws/handsim/src/handsim/polhemus_driver/src/polhemus_driver.c: In function ‘polhemus_get_pose’:
/home/scpeters/ws/handsim/src/handsim/polhemus_driver/src/polhemus_driver.c:226:12: error: ‘len’ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Werror=maybe-uninitialized]
   buf[len] = '\0';
            ^
/home/scpeters/ws/handsim/src/handsim/polhemus_driver/src/polhemus_driver.c: In function ‘polhemus_get_poses’:
/home/scpeters/ws/handsim/src/handsim/polhemus_driver/src/polhemus_driver.c:250:7: error: ‘len’ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Werror=maybe-uninitialized]
   int len;
       ^
cc1: all warnings being treated as errors

~~~

title.raw: Fix polhemus_driver warning, which causes build failure (-Werror) when build type is RelWithDebInfo
